caller_intent: The caller wants to make a payment for workers' compensation insurance and confirm that another policy (general liability) is set up for automatic payments.
resolution_steps: Agent confirms the caller's intent to pay for workers' comp and checks if automatic payments are already set up.
Caller explains they need to send a check and requests a photo of it.
Agent agrees to process the payment manually for $278 today.
Agent confirms the payment will be applied to the current month's premium.
Agent checks the general liability policy to verify automatic payments are active.
Agent confirms the next workers' comp payment is due August 22nd.
knowledge_required: Workers' compensation and general liability policy details
systems_referenced: Internal insurance agency payment processing system
summary: The caller requested to make a manual workers' comp payment and verify automatic payments for general liability. The agent processed the $278 payment, confirmed the current month's coverage, and scheduled the next workers' comp payment for August 22nd. The agent also verified the general liability policy's automatic payment status.
